items.content_html:
archive - contact - sexy exciting merchandise - search - about

Of course, when I say "fly" I speak metaphorically, as Spider-Man merely SWINGS on webs - save of course for when he had cosmic powers thanks to the Enigma Force and as Cosmic Spider-Man COULD fly, having obtained all the powers of Captain Universe. But THAT'S such an obvious caveat that it basically goes without saying.

← previousAugust 22nd, 2022next

August 22nd, 2022: In this comic, T-Rex assumes that all famous olde-timey stories were written by Shakespeare. Not me though! I'D never make such an embarrassing mistake!!

– Ryan
items.title: Dinosaur Comics!: Later on, T-Rex reads the Bible and notices Jesus can turn water into wine and wonders if he can ALSO swing from a thread.  God says "HOLD ON LEMME CHECK" and then a few minutes later says "NO"

items.content_html:
archive - contact - sexy exciting merchandise - search - about

seriously though: i stand by every word of this comic and believe all opinions within are fully justified by both texts

← previousAugust 19th, 2022next

August 19th, 2022: On the way back from PEI (it was a long drive) we listened to an audiobook of Anne of Green Gables. It was a dramatic reading version which was really good, EXCEPT for some reason all the lines of Anne's childhood friend Diane were performed by someone who sounded like they were 80 years old? It was initially hilarious but by the end I'd decided Anne had simply taken an old lady who was still in school as her bosom buddy. I am happy to inform you that this is canon.

– Ryan
items.title: Dinosaur Comics!: the inappropriate relationship gets transferred over from marty and lorraine to mr. phillips and prissy andrews.  IT ALL FITS

items.content_html: In Universe Pro®™ the laws of physics remain unchanged under time reversal, to maintain backward compatibility.
items.title: xkcd.com: Universe Price Tiers

items.content_html: Juraaaassic Park, Juraaaassic Park, God shed his grace on theeeee
items.title: xkcd.com: America Songs

items.content_html: 'Why did you get into fluid dynamics?' 'Well, SOME planet has to have the coolest clouds, odds are it's not ours, and rockets are slow.'
items.title: xkcd.com: Cloud Swirls

items.content_html: Ground-pole-ball-pole can be fun if you shake the first pole to get the second one whipping around dangerously, but the ball at the joint gets torn apart pretty fast.
items.title: xkcd.com: Tetherball Configurations

items.content_html: He may be a sword frog but he never skips leg day.
items.title: Swords: DCXLII - Frog On Your Throat

items.content_html: She's not the sharpest sword in the scabbard.
items.title: Swords: DCXLI - Absolutely Pommeled

items.content_html:
A true blacksmith uses *all* of their senses.

hawk the blacksmith: This is the tang, which is the part that does inside the hilt.

Sickle licks the tang with a SLURP! sound

sickle: Hmm...

sickle: It doesn't taste very tangy.

hawk the blacksmith: Stop.
items.title: Swords: DCXL - Tang Twister

items.content_html:
Look! It's a Board Sword.

sickle: Blacksmith! I demand your largest sword!

A young Sickle enters the blacksmiths with a SLAM! sound

Caption : Sickle, the Main Character

Dark Blacksmith: My largest swords are too powerful for you, young lady

sickle: But I invented these little wheels you can stick on 'em!

Sickle and the Dark Blacksmith go joy riding on their wheeled swords
items.title: Swords: DCXXXIX - Sick New Ride

items.content_html:
The quest to get her drinking buddy back.

sickle: You really don't remember who I am? After all of the cool adventures that we've been through together?

Caption : Sickle the Inventor

travel goblin: To be honest with you, I don't remember much of anything after putting on that skull mask... I just ended up here!

Caption : Travel Goblin?

travel goblin: Whoa! Is that a tapir?

travel goblin: ...With a rapier in its mouth?

sickle: Okay, let's start over from the beginning.
items.title: Swords: DCXXXVIII - Goblin Mode

items.content_html:
All wrapped up.

mysterious elf: Our Goblin-Self has used the last of his power to expel the three-eyed demon from the mortal realm. I call upon you in this vision to share your status. What of your charges?

mysterious troll: Old five-eyes is still sealed under demon island, mate! No worries there!

mysterious dwarf: The two-eyed demon is still sealed on Fury Mountain! Definitely!!

mysterious man: The one-eyed demon is still free within the dream realm, but Bograk's champion is keeping him in check there...

mysterious gnome: I have no concerns with six-eyes, either.

mysterious orc: I...uh, may have let things get out of control with my demon...

demon of sacred oaths: WWWRRRYYY!
items.title: Swords: DCXXXVII - Counselling Session

items.content_html:
Relax, they're professionals.

the good knight: I have just the thing to cheer you up! How about a quest?

quest sprout: QWEST!

Half-a-quest later

the good knight: You're almost across!

the good knight: That kids mother is going to kill me...!
items.title: Swords: DCXXXVI - A Hot New Quest

items.content_html:
Is that a swop?

quest sprout: SIP!

granny: Whew! I've finally cleaned the whole place up!

A bottle smashes on the ground with a SMASH! sound

Shadowy Creature: PE PE PE!

quest sprout: !!

the good knight: !!

granny: Again?!
items.title: Swords: DCXXXV - Shattered Peace

items.content_html:
The digital pen is mightier than the wooden sword!

Huion Kamvas Pro 13 (2.5k): I am the Huion Kamvas Pro 13 (2.5k)!

Huion Kamvas Pro 13 (2.5k): Claim me as your own and experience all of my powerful features!

quest sprout: HNGH.

Huion Kamvas Pro 13 (2.5k): Now go and wield my awesome power!

quest sprout:QWEST!

Huion Kamvas Pro 13 (2.5k): N-no... Not like that...!

Quest Sprout hits a rat with a BONK! sound
items.title: Swords: Swords x Huion

items.content_html:
PE PE PE!

The Adventur'r's Tavern is a mess, with broken bottles and knocked over furniture everywhere

granny: Ahh! My tavern! What happened?!

Drunk Pirate: It was that little quest fella, swinging around his little wooden sword! I saw it all! HIC!

The pirate falls asleep at the bar with a THUMP. sound

Drunk Pirate: ZZZ...

The Good Knight and Quest Sprout enter the room

granny: Sprout! How could you?!

quest sprout: Q-Qwest?
items.title: Swords: DCXXXIV - A Dreary Qwest Mess
